description: Core decision events - CK3-style decisions and invitations

events.bodyFallback: {LORD_NAME} is organizing a hunting party. A messenger approaches you with an invitation. The Lord's hunts are known for good sport and fine company - though they can be tiring affairs.

options.textFallback: "I am honored, my Lord. I shall attend."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You spend the day riding with {LORD_NAME}'s party. The hunt is successful, and you return with new connections and a share of the catch.

options.textFallback: "I am grateful for the honor, but duty keeps me at camp."
options.outcomeTextFallback: The messenger nods and departs. Perhaps another time.

events.bodyFallback: {LANCE_MATE} waves you over to a group gathered around a small fire. "Come on, {PLAYER_RANK}! We need fresh gold in the pot." The dice game looks lively, and you could use some relaxation.

options.textFallback: "Deal me in - small stakes only."
options.outcomeTextFallback: Lady luck favors you tonight. You walk away with your stake doubled and a few new friends.

options.textFallback: "I'm feeling lucky. High stakes."
options.outcomeTextFallback: The dice fly, the gold flows. You take the pot with a winning streak that has the whole lance talking.

options.textFallback: "Not tonight. I need my rest."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You retire to your tent. The sounds of laughter and curses drift through the night.

events.bodyFallback: {SERGEANT} approaches during training. "You show promise, soldier. I could work with you after the regular session - push you harder than the rest. It'll be exhausting, but you'll improve faster."

options.textFallback: "I'm ready for whatever you can teach me, Sergeant."
options.outcomeTextFallback: The additional training is brutal, but effective. Your muscles ache, but your blade moves faster.

options.textFallback: "I appreciate the offer, but I need to pace myself."
options.outcomeTextFallback: {SERGEANT} shrugs. "Your choice. The offer stands." You continue with the standard regimen.

events.bodyFallback: {LANCE_LEADER} pulls you aside. "I need someone reliable for a longer patrol. Two days out, mapping the terrain ahead. It's harder work, but I'll make sure you're compensated."

options.textFallback: "Consider it done. I'll have a full report for you."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You ride out at dawn and return two days later with detailed reports. {LANCE_LEADER} nods with approval and hands you a pouch of coins.

options.textFallback: "I'm not in condition for extended patrol right now."
options.outcomeTextFallback: {LANCE_LEADER} frowns slightly but accepts your answer. Someone else will take the assignment.

events.bodyFallback: A commotion breaks out near the medical tent. One of the wounded has taken a turn for the worse - fever and infection. The other medics look to you. "What do we do? The surgeon isn't here!"

options.textFallback: "Get me clean water and fresh bandages. I'll handle this."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You work through the night, applying poultices and monitoring the soldier's condition. By dawn, the fever breaks. Word spreads of your skill.

options.textFallback: "We need the surgeon. Someone ride to find him - I'll stabilize the patient."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You keep the soldier stable until the surgeon arrives. A prudent choice - the surgeon handles the complication expertly.

events.bodyFallback: A traveling merchant approaches with a wagon of surplus goods. "I've got quality supplies here - arrows, blankets, preserved meat. I can give you a good price, but I need to move quickly. The captain doesn't need to know the details..."

options.textFallback: "I'll need to clear any purchase through proper channels."
options.outcomeTextFallback: The merchant grumbles but agrees to wait. You get authorization, and the company gains quality supplies through legitimate means.

options.textFallback: "Show me what you've got. We can work something out."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You skim a little off the top while getting the company a good deal. Risky, but profitable.

options.textFallback: "Something seems off here. I should report this."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You alert the captain. The merchant's goods turn out to be stolen from a nearby village. Your vigilance is noted.

events.bodyFallback: {LANCE_MATE} pulls you aside with a troubled look. "I need to ask a favor. My family... they've fallen behind on their debts. I need coin, and quickly. Could you lend me something? I swear I'll repay you when I can."

options.textFallback: "Take what you need, friend. We look after our own."
options.outcomeTextFallback: {LANCE_MATE}'s face floods with relief. "You're a good soldier, {PLAYER_NAME}. I won't forget this." He takes the coin and hurries off to send it to his family.

options.textFallback: "I can spare a little. It's not much, but take it."
options.outcomeTextFallback: {LANCE_MATE} nods gratefully. "Every bit helps. Thank you, {PLAYER_NAME}." He pockets the coins with a small smile.

options.textFallback: "I can't afford to give away my coin. I'm sorry."
options.outcomeTextFallback: {LANCE_MATE}'s expression hardens slightly, but he nods. "I understand. Times are hard for everyone." He walks away without another word.

events.bodyFallback: {LANCE_MATE} approaches with a grin and a pouch of coins. "I told you I'd repay you, didn't I? My sister sold some of the family land - we're back on our feet. Here's what I owe, and a little extra for your trust."

options.textFallback: "I'm glad things worked out. Thank you."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You pocket the coins with a nod. {LANCE_MATE} claps you on the shoulder. "If you ever need anything, just ask." A bond has been strengthened.

options.textFallback: "Keep it. Consider it a gift between lance mates."
options.outcomeTextFallback: {LANCE_MATE} stares at you in surprise, then breaks into a broad smile. "You're one of the good ones, {PLAYER_NAME}. I'll remember this." Your reputation in the lance soars.

events.bodyFallback: {LANCE_MATE} finds you during a rest break and hands you a small bundle. "It's not much, but I found this while foraging. Thought you might want it, after what you did for me."

options.textFallback: "Thank you. It means a lot."
options.outcomeTextFallback: You unwrap the bundle to find a few useful supplies. Small gestures, but they build trust within the lance.
